text: What a Way to Go! is a 1964 American romantic comedy musical movie. It was directed by J. Lee Thompson. It stars Shirley MacLaine, Paul Newman, Robert Mitchum, Dean Martin, Gene Kelly, Robert Cummings and Dick Van Dyke. This movie was intended for Marilyn Monroe, but she died before the movie began filming. == Other websites == * Category:1964 romantic comedy movies Category:1964 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1960s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by J. Lee Thompson
title: What a Way to Go!
